Metadata.title: Felipe Vaz - Portfolio | Front-End Developer
Metadata.description: Hi, I'm Felipe Vaz! A Front-End Developer passionate about crafting creative and high-performance interfaces.

Header.title: Creativity & Purpose.
Header.subtitle: Exploring out-of-the-box challenges with effective and technical solutions.

lines.2nd: Use ↑ ↓ to navigate and “Enter” to select a command.

About.content:
Fascinated by Web Development, I love turning ideas into interactive and functional interfaces. Since I started programming, I’ve been striving to create solutions that break the mold, always exploring new ways to combine creativity and technology.

My name is Felipe, I'm 20 years old and I'm looking for my first opportunity in the job market. I believe programming goes far beyond code — it’s a tool to innovate, solve problems, and impact people.

portfolio.name: Portfolio
portfolio.description: A simple, creative, and modern portfolio, designed to elegantly and objectively showcase projects. Built with cutting-edge technologies to provide a smooth, responsive, and visually striking experience.
